name: @plumeria/core
description: Near Zero-runtime CSS-in-JS for efficient design systems.
author: Refirst

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && pnpm build:mjs && pnpm cjs && pnpm minify && cp -r src/styles dist
scripts.build:mjs: pnpm esm && for file in $(find dist -name '*.js'); do mv "$file" "${file%.*}.mjs"; done
scripts.minify: for file in $(find dist -name '*.js' -o -name '*.mjs'); do terser "$file" -m -o "$file"; done
